name: Love Blocks!
description:
Solve the puzzle to bring together the cute couple in valentine’s day!

Easy controls, just swipe the characters to bring them together in the target point.

Lovely game experience while using your brain!

Features
-Free to play. Play it anytime anywhere.
-Enjoy the fun of unlocking new couples.
-New levels every week.
-Simple mechanics but a little difficult levels to clear.
publishers: Rollic Games Oyun Yazilim ve Pazarlama Anonim Sirketi
